snippet: Ryan Hunter-Reay and James Hinchcliffe made it an all-Andretti Autosport front row for the Toyota Grand Prix of Long Beach in California.
lead_paragraph: Ryan Hunter-Reay and James Hinchcliffe made it an all-Andretti Autosport front row for the Toyota Grand Prix of Long Beach in California.

headline.main: Top Qualifiers Both Race for Andretti
headline.print_headline: Top Qualifiers Both Race for Andretti
